metadata.title: Cracks Hospitality | Soul & Scale
metadata.description: Where hospitality vision meets execution. Expert consulting and AI-powered technology for restaurant success.

hero.title: Cracks Hospitality
hero.subtitle: Building Hospitality Icons, One Restaurant at a Time
hero.description: Cracks Hospitality exists to design, operationalize, and scale hospitality businesses by combining expert consulting, advanced technology, and education-driven media.
hero.description2: We create pragmatic, profit-focused solutions that bridge the gap between operational excellence, guest experience, and brand scalability.

about.title: Our Philosophy
about.subtitle: Meet the Team
about.description: Founded by Manuel Palacio, co-founder of Hong Kong's Pirata Group with 27 venues and Cento Bangkok, and Nacho López, with 15+ years' experience turning raw spaces into high-revenue destinations, we bring unparalleled expertise to your hospitality venture.
about.description2: We envision a hospitality hub where restaurateurs have everything they need to bring their concepts to life. A place where expert guidance, smart technology, and real industry knowledge come together to build and launch faster, smarter, and with less overwhelm.
about.description3: Whether you're a first-time restaurateur or a global hotel group, our goal is the same: to bring everything we've learned over 20 years and 50+ openings to you. The wins, the failures, the lessons. So you can skip the painful parts and get to what matters.

soul.title: Soul
soul.description: Authentic concepts with cultural depth and genuine guest experiences that create lasting connections.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Operational systems designed for sustainable growth, profitability, and consistent excellence across locations.

synergy.title: Synergy
synergy.description: Expert consulting powered by AI-driven technology, bridging human expertise with intelligent automation.

difference.title: How We Think Differently
difference.subtitle: We build destination restaurants that perform.
difference.intro: Each concept is rooted in place, driven by purpose, and built to perform. For guests, teams, and owners alike.

traffic.title: Restaurants That Drive Traffic
traffic.description: We turn F&B into a core reason people visit your space; not just for the food, but for the energy, identity, and experience it offers.

creativity.title: Performance-Driven Creativity
creativity.description: Combining thoughtful design with commercial insight to craft concepts that are both emotionally resonant and operationally sound.

speed.title: Speed & Execution
speed.description: Work with clarity and pace. Our solutions provides operators clear roadmaps and actionable plans that accelerate results and reduce inefficiencies.

difference.conclusion: We give restaurants a reason to exist beyond their walls, turning them into lasting destinations with real impact.

studio.name: Cracks Studio
studio.description: Hands-on consulting for restaurant concept development, from strategy to successful launch. Perfect for operators who want expert guidance through every phase.

app.name: Cracks App
app.description: Our app transforms your restaurant vision into a comprehensive, actionable business plan. Perfect for entrepreneurs who want to validate and develop concepts efficiently.
app.audience: For: Entrepreneurs, franchise operators, F&B startups

founders.title: The Founders
founders.subtitle: 40+ years of combined experience. 50+ successful openings across 3 continents.

manuel.name: Manuel Palacio
manuel.bio: Co-founder of Pirata Group, one of Hong Kong's most successful restaurant portfolios with 27 venues across 13 brands including PICI, TokyoLima, and Pirata. Manuel brings a proven track record of building culture-first teams and scaling hospitality brands across Asia.

achievements.1: Co-founder of Pirata Group (27 venues, 13 brands)
achievements.2: Scaled brands like PICI, TokyoLima, Pirata across Asia
achievements.3: Chairman of Pirata Group, Founder of Cento Bangkok

nacho.name: Nacho López
nacho.bio: With 15+ years in hospitality across Spain, Hong Kong, and Thailand, Nacho has led operations at some of the industry's most celebrated venues. His people-first approach and operational excellence have driven success from Ibiza beach clubs to Hong Kong's top pasta concepts.

achievements.2: Operations Manager at PICI Hong Kong
achievements.3: Director at Cala Bassa Beach Club, Ibiza

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Whether you're looking for hands-on consulting or an AI-powered development platform, we're here to help you build something exceptional.
